name: AP_CLAIM_ICD_PROC
description: The AP_CLAIM_ICD_PROC table contains the ICD-9 Procedure information on an accounts payable claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter of the ICD-9 procedure code on the claim.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the ICD-9 procedure code on the claim.

columns.name: ICD_PX_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.

columns.name: ICD_PX_DT
columns.description: The date of the ICD-9 procedure code.

columns.name: ICD_PX_RANK
columns.description: The rank of this International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedure compared to the other ICD procedures on the claim.
